website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenBook Pro Duo is a thoughtful, albeit pricey, reinvention of the laptop, with a second screen in the keyboard base and an Intel Core i9 processor that should appeal to creative professionals with resource-intensive workflows.
pros: Unique ScreenPad Plus second display simplifies workflows
Main display is an OLED panel
Intel Core i9 and Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 offer computing muscle

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase I’ve made in my life!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this laptop for just a little over a month and I’d like to begin by saying: what a beast! This model may just be the most perfect combination of aesthetics, efficiency and performance. It covers my needs as a design student and game lover, its performance on high resolution is impeccable and its portability can surprisingly outrun other models I’ve used. Needles to say this models specs are over the top to its size. Overall, one of the greatest purchases I’ve made in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic future proof laptop
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews seem to focus on seller specific issues rather than the product itself. A fantastic laptop with future proof insides Whizzes through tasks with ease. Fan noise completely acceptable even at max load. More than capable of handling recent game releases and loads up Adobe software super fast. The second screen is an ever so slight gimmick however one that does often surprise with the extra visual space it offers. All-in-all a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Think Karma

customer_reviews.title: problematic
customer_reviews.text: firstly the screenpad software never worked. Secondly windows 10 kept getting deactivated after each update. Perhaps microsoft has a beef with Asus. Ordered replacement; screenpad software did still not work but fingers crossed win10 still activated after numerous updates.
customer_reviews.author: jackobyte

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Totally in love with my new laptop. I have always liked ASUS but this new one has me swooning. The second screen really isn't a gimmick. It's so useful and the it's touch (and has a pen for detailed stuff) is just the best. Anyway, it's fast, slick and does the job well. I really can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Arguably the best day-to-day laptop around
customer_reviews.text: Clearly the best laptop on the market. No issue with the screen (I read some bad reviews about the quality of the screens) the main screen is crisp and the screenpad is matt, which works very well. I returned my 2020 MBP 16" with touch bar for this beautiful laptop gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Williams

customer_reviews.title: Usb c is not display friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop been really usefull. I think for me the biggest draw back has been that the USBC on the side cannot be used for charging and is not display enabled. I get that it's a cost saving but really that's a massive impact and I probably wouldn't have picked this model if I had realised and I'm always in multi screen layout.
customer_reviews.author: Afterimg

customer_reviews.title: The Two Screens are very helpfull
customer_reviews.text: We are just starting to use this and have found it very good so far, we wanted to do calculations on one screen whilst the Quotation comes up on the second screen, and we are working on it now.

customer_reviews.title: Desktop replacement
customer_reviews.text: A powerful laptop designed to replace desktops. As such it uses a lot of power and thus the battery might not last even 1 hour.

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: One of the most hated things I’ve ever bought. Screen Pad (2nd screen) software wouldn’t update correctly from day one. From early on there were issues getting the power cable to actually charge the laptop battery. After ten months it stopped booting up at all and nothing I tried could fix it. I’ve already gotten rid of this laptop after less than a year and will never buy an ASUS product again in my life.

product_meta.title: ASUS ZenBook Pro Duo UX581GV 15.6 Inch 4K Dual Touchscreen Alexa Enabled Laptop (Celestial Blue) (Intel i7-9750H, 512 GB PCI-e SSD, 16 GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB Graphics, Windows 10)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:2019 Version| Size Name:15.6" 4K Dual-Touchscreen| Style Name:i7-9750H + RTX 2060Take your creativity and productivity to the next level with the groundbreaking ASUS ZenBook Pro Duo. Designed to give you the ultimate edge in workflow efficiency, the unique design features a full-width 4K ASUS ScreenPad Plus that works seamlessly with the main 4K UHD OLED display. It’s never been this easy to harness your full creative power.
feature_bullets: With its full-width 4K secondary touchscreen, that works seamlessly with the main 15.6 Inch 4K UHD OLED touchscreen, the 2019 ZenBook Pro is the perfect multi-tasker
ZenBook Pro Duo is powered by up to a 9th Generation Intel Core i7 processor, with gaming-grade NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 6 GB graphics and blisteringly fast storage
The 4K UHD NanoEdge display on ZenBook Pro Duo is truly amazing, with a four-sided frameless design featuring ultraslim bezels

ZenBook Pro Duo also features the latest version of the ASUS NumberPad, an LED-illuminated numeric keypad integrated into the touchpad. Tap on the top-right NumberPad icon for one second to switch the function on and off, and tap on the top-left icon to choose one of two brightness levels
Enjoy hands-free login on your laptop, using the infrared camera with Windows Hello to login with just a glance — even in the dark!
